function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of spatial connection and analysis tools may result in inaccurate identification of activity centers.","Impact":"Misidentification of activity centers could lead to misallocation of resources for disease control and prevention.","Mitigation":"Use multiple methods for activity center identification and cross-validate the results for accuracy.","Technologies":"GIS software with advanced spatial analysis capabilities, machine learning algorithms for spatial pattern recognition.","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, city administrators.","Owner":"GIS specialists, data analysts, urban planning departments."}]}
